scripts.nuke:preserve-admins: set NUKE_ALL=1 && set NUKE_PRESERVE_ADMINS=1 && medusa exec ./src/scripts/nuke-db.ts
scripts.nuke:preserve-admins:store: set NUKE_ALL=1 && set NUKE_PRESERVE_ADMINS=1 && set NUKE_PRESERVE_STORE=1 && medusa exec ./src/scripts/nuke-db.ts
scripts.nuke:orders:dry-run: set NUKE_ORDERS=1 && set NUKE_DRY_RUN=1 && medusa exec ./src/scripts/nuke-orders.ts
scripts.test:integration:http:win: set TEST_TYPE=integration:http && set NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules && set DATABASE_URL=file:./.tmp/test.sqlite && set STORE_CORS=* && set ADMIN_CORS=* && set AUTH_CORS=* && jest --silent=false --runInBand --forceExit
scripts.test:integration:modules:win: set TEST_TYPE=integration:modules && set NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules && set DATABASE_URL=file:./.tmp/test.sqlite && set STORE_CORS=* && set ADMIN_CORS=* && set AUTH_CORS=* && jest --silent=false --runInBand --forceExit
scripts.test:unit:win: set TEST_TYPE=unit && set NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules && set DATABASE_URL=file:./.tmp/test.sqlite && set STORE_CORS=* && set ADMIN_CORS=* && set AUTH_CORS=* && jest --silent --runInBand --forceExit
